CustomField.formula: IF((ISPICKVAL( Enrollment_Type__c , 'Returning Student')) && (((Total_Forms__c - Total_Forms_Completed__c)=1) ||((Total_Forms__c - Total_Forms_Completed__c)=0))&& (Initial_ECA_Creation_Complete__c=True), 'Tasks Completed' , 'Tasks Not Completed')
CustomField.label: ITR Tasks Status
